text: 1:5 1 Korin 2:4-5; 4:20; Kolosi 2:2; Hibru 2:3Akar aghuir e inigha ia bagha izezim, an akar kɨnimɨn mɨn ia bagha izezir puvatɨ. A Godɨn Duam ko gavgavim sara ize. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia guizbangɨra fo, akar kam a bar guizɨn akam. E ian tongɨn ikiava ian akuraghasava amizir arazim, ia uari a gɨfo.
